title: Venom Bolt
data:
{{version030}} {{flavour|Fires a penetrating bolt of poison.}} '''Venom Bolt''' is a monster-only [[bolt spell]] which causes [[poison]] damage to all enemies that it strikes along its path, both immediately and over time by poisoning them. [[Poison#Poison_Resistance|Poison resistance]] reduces the damage dealt by this spell by 66% and prevents the poison effect 66% of the time. Targets with complete poison immunity, including the [[undead]] and [[nonliving]], are completely unaffected by this spell. {{monsters with spell}} ==History== {{spell |name=Venom Bolt |level=5 |school1={{Conjurations}} |school2={{Poison Magic}} |school3= |castingnoise=5 |spellnoise=5 |sources=
*[[Young Poisoner's Handbook]] *[[Book of Power]]
}} {{AttackSpell |name=Venom Bolt |formula = 4d(4+0.15*Power) |maxdmg = 4d34 |maxsp = 200 |range = 6 |target = Bolt |tohit = 8+Power/20 |special = [[Poison]] |hit_type = normal |hit_adder = 8 |hit_num = 1 |hit_denom = 20 |dam_calculator = calcdice |dam_numdice = 4 |dam_adder = 16 |dam_num = 3 |dam_denom = 5}} *Prior to [[0.25]], Venom Bolt was a level 5 [[Conjurations]]/[[Poison Magic]] spell available to players. *Prior to [[0.12]], Venom Bolt did less damage.
